verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Intro: C F x2
In the quiet, in the stillness
I know that You are God
In the secret, of Your presence
I know there I am restored
When You call I won't refuse
Each new day again I'll choose

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There is no one else for meNone but Jesus
Crucified to set me free
Now I live to bring Him praise F G C Em7 Am x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the chaos, in confusion
I know You're sovereign still
In the moment of my weakness
You give me grace to do Your will
Oh when You call I won't delay
This my song through all my days-> chorus x2

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
All my delight is in You LordAll of my hope, all of my strength
All my delight is in You Lord
Forever more x2 ->chorus x2
